ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Epidemiologic daily updated cases can be found on the following web pages: https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/situation-reports/. https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/novel-coronavirus-china.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: No funding or sponsorship was received for this study or publication of this article.

sec.title: Authorship
sec.p: All named authors meet the International Committee of Medical Journal Editors (ICMJE) criteria for authorship for this article, take responsibility for the integrity of the work as a whole and have given their approval for this version to be published.

sec.title: Disclosures
sec.p: Erica dâ€™Anchera, Federica Sandri, Marta Savio and Armando Stefanati declare that they have no conflict of interest. Giovanni Gabutti declares that he does not have a specific conflict of interest related to this paper; however, he reports grants from Sanofi Pasteur MSD, GSK Biologicals SA, Pfizer, Sanofi Pasteur Italy, MSD Italy, Emergent BioSolutions and Seqirus for taking part to advisory boards, expert meetings, for acting as speaker and/or organizer of meetings/congresses and as principal investigator and chief of O.U. in RCTs.

sec.title: Compliance with Ethics Guidelines
sec.p: This article is based on previously conducted studies and does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors.

sec.title: Data Availability
sec.p: Data sharing is not applicable to this article as no datasets were generated or analyzed during the current study.
